entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:50 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 8:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 9.5°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
